subject: Basketball
organizations: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus
lead_paragraph: Making way for the circus, the Nets are leaving for 17 days to 8 cities. That’s life for N.B.A. teams that share their arenas with events like the Grammys and Disney on Ice.
snippet: Making way for the circus, the Nets are leaving for 17 days to 8 cities. That’s life for N.B.A. teams that share their arenas with events like the Grammys and Disney on Ice.
